column4: hello, i'm a bit of a noob in Linux, but I have this problem. I don't have a browser anymore so i want to apt-get one. But he says this:Setting up mozilla-firefox (1.0.7-0ubuntu0.1) ...
subprocess post-installation script returned error exit status 127
E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
but the thing is , i don't have a browser to surf
Do you have the Ubuntu CDs?
i put the cd in my pc
What CD did you get, Live or Install
There is your problem, The Live CD contains a firefox installer
Let me get you a download of firefox
it's an EXE of FF on the cd
